content.eamr: ( ing-0 "12 ounces dry fettuccine pasta" )
( ing-1 "1 pound lean ground beef (optional)" )
( ing-2 "1 cup chopped onion" )
( ing-3 "1 cup red bell pepper, chopped" )
( ing-4 "1 tablespoon butter" )
( ing-5 "1 (29 ounce) can diced tomatoes" )
( ing-6 "1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms" )
( ing-7 "3 tablespoons chopped black olives" )
( ing-8 "2 teaspoons dried oregano" )
( ing-9 "1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese" )
( ing-10 "1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese" )

content.text: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup" )
( ing-12 "1/4 cup beef broth" )
( ing-13 "1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese" )

content.text: 0) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
1) Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain.
2) In a large skillet, brown beef over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "brown"@23:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "beef"@29:33 / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium heat"@39:50 / TEMPERATURE )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large skillet"@6:21 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Drain fat from pan, and transfer meat to a bowl.
4) In the same skillet, cook onion and bell pepper in butter until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "cook"@24:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@29:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "bell pepper"@39:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "butter"@54:60 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until tender"@61:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "the same skillet"@6:22 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, olives, and  beef, and season with oregano.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "tomatoes"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "mushrooms"@21:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "olives"@32:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "beef"@45:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "season"@55:61 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "oregano"@67:74 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-7-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( tool-7-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
9) Arrange half of the cooked fettuccine in the prepared dish, top with half of the beef and vegetable mixture, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese and 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "half of the cooked fettuccine"@11:40 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "the prepared dish"@44:61 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "top"@63:66 / AC
		:ppt ( "half of the beef and vegetable mixture"@72:110 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-2 "sprinkle"@116:124 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese"@130:155 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese"@160:188 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Mix together soup and beef broth until smooth, and pour over casserole.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Mix"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "soup"@17:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "beef broth"@26:36 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-11-0 "until smooth"@37:49 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-11-1 "pour"@55:59 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( "casserole"@65:74 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until heated through.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:loc ( tool-13-0 "preheated oven"@12:26 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-13-0 "30 to 35 minutes"@31:47 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-13-0 "until heated through"@52:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
